title: Best Scary Movie since 'It Follows'
review: Words cannot describe. It was nightmare inducing. Never have I ever wanted to walk out of a film because I felt haunted by the images on screen. This movie will make you feel a range of emotion.

title: Brilliant
review:
A Modern Day Ben-Hur.
I have no words without spoiling it.
Just go.

title: 35 years
review: Still my favorite movie of all time. Wish I could have seen it when it released.
